text: @TheRealVordox I know that. But what I'm trying to say is that Kurushi Final is a different game (it is the sequel to the first Intelligent Qube/Kurushi). I heard that song "Healing Light" as the ending theme of Kurushi Final. Here in the Philippines, the first game is known as Intelligent Qube while the sequel is known as  Kurushi Final

text:
@pengselim 
haha exactly the same here! I played the 2nd and 4th stage over and over again, until I got a perfect, just for the kicks.

Now that I'm older, I decided to invest and get a copy of it. About 80$, but it was worth it!
Just think of it as an investment. You sell it a couple of months later and get you money back. (or a little more!)
